RuntimeErrorAnalysis.Summary: Wrong or unavailable database host for Oracle
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.SampleLogOutput: org.springframework.jdbc.CannotGetJdbcConnectionException: Could not get JDBC Connection; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: Io exception: The Network Adapter could not establish the connection
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.RegExpPattern: org.springframework.jdbc.CannotGetJdbcConnectionException: Could not get JDBC Connection; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: Io exception: The Network Adapter could not establish the connection
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.ProblemDetailHtml: Wrong database host specified in connection string or host is unavailable
